The Diving Bell and the Butterfly is a memoir by journalist Jean-Dominique 
Bauby. It describes what his life is like after suffering a massive stroke that left him 
with locked-in syndrome. It also details what his life was like before the stroke. On 
December 8, 1995, Bauby, the editor-in-chief of French Elle magazine, ... For the 
2007 film, see The Diving Bell and the Butterfly (film).
